snippet: Broadcast to frighten and manipulate, the Islamic State’s flamboyant violence consumes the world’s attention while more familiar threats kill far more people.
abstract: Some human rights and antigovernment activists in Syria are borrowing Islamic State's tactic of using videos featuring shocking content to highlight scale of carnage wrought by Syrian war; one such video features children in orange jumpsuits being herded into cage, while an activist questions why there is no global response to bombings that routinely kill Syrian children.
